item.description:
Come on down for a very informal breakfast at Bullock Hangar for FPA members and friends. We need to get our equipment out and dust it off for the spring season. The first batch or two of egg muffins and burritos might have some winter dirt in them. If you bite down and feel a stone, you win!

This will be a good time for new members to come and get a chance to meet people and for anyone looking to help at on the spring shows to come learn how to grills work.

After the grills cool down, we can maybe fire up our engines and head for an afternoon flight!

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Spring FPA Breakfast Grill dust off!
